question: Which are the basin countries of Gulf of Fonseca?
option4: United States of America, Mexico and Guatemala
explanation: Gulf of Fonseca is a large body of water in the Pacific Ocean located on the western coast of Central America bordering El Salvador, Honduras and Nicaragua. Gulf of Fonseca separates El Salvador from Nicaragua. The gulf is composed by a group of many volcanic islands such as Zacati Grande and el Tigre in Honduras.
